name: Drop 'n' Roll
description:
Guide a water drop through challenging puzzles by exploiting the three aggregation states! Step onto hot plates to turn into vapor and use cold blocks to become solid. Each state has special features and skills that you will discover as the game progresses. Only using all of them you will be able to complete the levels! Collect all the lights and the special relics in order to unlock extra levels that will be more and more difficult and, obviously, more and more fun!

Drop ‘n’ Roll is a puzzle game developed for the Video Game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano. More information at:

http://www.polimigamecollective.org
